channel.title: I get a error when I run a client
channel.description: Well every time I try to run a client I get this error: [code] # # An unexpected error has been detected by Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_FLT_STACK_CHECK (0xc0000092) at pc=0x0093cea9, pid=1352, tid=2680 # # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (1.6.0_02-ea-b02 mixed mode, sharing) # Problematic frame: # v ~RuntimeStub::resolve_opt_virtual_call # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # [/code]

item.title: I get a error when I run a client
item.dc:creator: @Master_Guru Master Guru
item.description:
@Master_Guru wrote:

I did. Client runs but when I try to log-in it says error on Run Client thing. Can anyone else help?

Read full topic
item.source: I get a error when I run a client

item.title: I get a error when I run a client

@Master_Guru wrote:

Well every time I try to run a client I get this error:

#
